title: How long on average does it take to get a reply from Riot Player Support
body: So I submitted a player support ticket last night and still haven't gotten a reply. How long does it take on average to get a reply

replies.body: Our queue is a little backed up at the moment, so it may take a bit to respond to your ticket.  Don't bump your tickets in the meantime!  Doing so will bump your ticket to the bottom and delay a response.  I've confirmed that your ticket is successfully in queue, and we'll respond as soon as we can!
days if not weeks. riot doesn't care about their players as long as the money keeps coming in
